comments.en:
To get its maximum quality, use the "hpijs" driver. 600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Stand-alone copying works only for black-and-white copies. Color copying can only be done by software, under free operating systems preferrably with "xsane". Note that this is very slow due to the necessity of downloading the whole image to the PC and converting it to PostScript and back to a bitmap.

Faxing from and to the PC is not supported.

You can clean the printer's nozzles via the front panel menues, but you cannot align the heads this way.

Older user comment:

Installs and prints postscript and ascii in b/w or colour under printtool and printerdrake, drivers: most PCL ones, "hpijs" from HP is the best choice.
